title: CMMC Assessment Guide Level 2
source_organization: Department of Defense Chief Information Officer (DoD CIO)
purpose: This document provides guidance in the preparation for and conduct of a Level 2 self-assessment or Level 2 certification assessment under the Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) Program as set forth in section 170.16 of title 32, Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) and 32 CFR § 170.17 respectively.
focus: Level 2 addresses the protection of Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI).
applicability: This guide is intended for assessors, OSAs [Organizations Seeking Assessment], cybersecurity professionals, and individuals and companies that support CMMC efforts. It can be used as part of preparation for and conducting a Level 2 self-assessment or a Level 2 certification assessment, as set forth in 32 CFR § 170.16 and 32 CFR § 170.17.
basis: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Special Publication (SP) 800-171 Revision 2; title 32, Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) § 170.16 and § 170.17.
